sentence.text: Males are more slender than females and have a more rounded anal fin .
She was squatting down in the photograph and Sabrina estimated her to have been a little over five feet with a slender petite figure and a pale , milky complexion .
She was slender and very fair with long golden hair and as unlike as possible any Naulls that had ever been .
Pavlova was unusually slender in an era when women were expected to be well rounded .
Next to Victor was his brother Ernest , slender and rather dandyish in his dress although , like the rest of his family , he was in deep mourning .
Her slender body was untidily bundled up in a big leathery jacket and she was wearing long , shiny red boots .
The emerald dress was in a heap on the floor , and Isobel 's slender pale boyish body was stretched out naked on his narrow college bed .
On her slender body was only the bathrobe , which fluttered out behind her as she ran into the steaming night .
Her slender body trembled helplessly as she lay gazing up at his tall , lithe figure , her normally pale cheeks covered by a hectic flush of rising excitement .
His almost bare chest and the high , curved horns he wears accentuate his height and his slender build .
Of the luxury items that pargeted his slender form , none was as breathtaking as his hair , with its layers of pampered light .
His glittering gaze raked her slender form .
Briefly she saw in her mind a slender girl walking the shore , beating her hands one against the other in bitter rebellion .
A slender , tawny-haired girl sits opposite eating cereal , avoiding my eyes .
A slender man with a wisp of grey beard and an air of pleasant idleness was lying on one elbow beside a yew .
As I was about to open my mouth like a fish , the outer door swung open and in bounced two hounds , followed by a slender young man shaking raindrops from his head .
A slender young woman in a green flowered dress with lacy bits at the neck and cuffs was standing in the doorway .
I turned towards the voice and saw a slender young woman hurrying towards me .
Behind it , commanding the doorway , sat a slender woman in a black-and-white silk suit who had tried , quite successfully , to lop ten years from her thirty-five .
He turned and looked at the slender woman cowering in her chair .
She must have been sixteen or seventeen summers old , tall and slender , and her eyes were as blue as a clear summer sky .
He recalled Marion , slender and exciting .
Then he laid her on the bed and feasted his eyes on her , slender and seductive , totally naked except for the glowing ruby that flashed fire whenever she moved her hand .
